p: T.Y. and K.T. conceived and designed the study, and all other authors assisted in its design. T.O., Y.E., and N.S. led the trial's steering committee. K.M. and M.Y. wrote the first draft of the manuscript. M.Y. designed and conducted all statistical analyses. K.M., H.S., and T.H. were responsible for the pharmacokinetic assay. All authors were involved in the interpretation and critical review of the data and in drafting and revising the manuscript for important intellectual content; all approved the final version proposed by Y.S.
